title: Ronan Farrow
description: Watch with Prime starting 2/28. Journalist Ronan Farrow discusses his new MSNBC show "Ronan Farrow Daily."

title: Hooman Majd
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/4. Author Hooman Majd sits down with Jon to discuss his book "The Ministry of Guidance Invites You to Not Stay: An American Family in Iran."

title: Michio Kaku
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/5. Theoretical physicist and author Michio Kaku discusses his latest book "The Future of the Mind: The Scientific Quest to Understand, Enhance, and Empower the Mind."

title: Liam Neeson
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/6. Actor Liam Neeson chats with Jon about his upcoming movie "Non-Stop."

title: Kevin Roose
description: Author and journalist Kevin Roose stops by the show to talk about his book "Young Money: Inside the Hidden World of Wall Street's Post-Crash Recruits."

title: Seth MacFarlane
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/11. Seth MacFarlane stops by the show to talk about "A Million Ways to Die in the West."

title: Jim DeMint
description: Former U.S. Senator Jim DeMint discusses his new book "Falling in Love with America Again."

title: Rachel Maddow
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/13. Jon speaks with Rachel Maddow, host of "The Rachel Maddow Show" on MSNBC.

title: Kimberly Marten
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/14. Kimberly Marten, the Ann Whitney Olin Professor of Political Science at Barnard College, discusses the crisis in Ukraine.

title: Paul Taylor
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/18. Jon welcomes to the show Paul Taylor, author of the book "The Next America: Boomers, Millennials, and the Looming Generational Showdown."

title: Andrew Napolitano
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/19/2014. Jon speaks with Judge Andrew Napolitano, senior judicial analyst for Fox News Channel.

title: Jason Bateman
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/20. Jason Bateman stops by the show to talk about his new movie "Bad Words."

title: Anita Hill
description: Watch with Prime starting 3/21. Anita Hill, Professor of Social Policy, Law, and Women's Studies at Brandeis University, sits down with Jon to discuss the documentary "Anita."

title: Arianna Huffington
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/1. Arianna Huffington, editor-in-chief of The Huffington Post, discusses her latest book "Thrive: The Third Metric to Redefining Success and Creating a Life of Well-Being, Wisdom, and Wonder."

title: Amy Yates Wuelfing & Gibby Haynes
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/2. Jon welcomes to the show Amy Yates Wuelfing, co-author of "No Slam Dancing, No Stage Diving, No Spikes," and Gibby Haynes, lead singer of Butthole Surfers, to talk about the legendary dive bar and concert venue City Gardens.

title: Jude Law
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/3. Actor Jude Law sits down with Jon to talk about his role in the movie "Dom Hemingway."

title: Nate Silver
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/4. Jon speaks with Nate Silver, founder and editor in chief of FiveThirtyEight.com.

title: Peter Dinklage
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/8. Actor Peter Dinklage stops by the show to talk about the new season of "Game of Thrones."

title: Michael Lewis
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/9. Financial journalist Michael Lewis discusses his book "Flash Boys: A Wall Street Revolt."

title: Samuel L. Jackson
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/10. Jon talks to Samuel L. Jackson about his role in the new movie "Captain America: The Winter Soldier."

title: Pelé
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/11. Brazilian soccer legend Pele sits down with Jon to talk about his memoir "Why Soccer Matters."

title: Matt Taibbi
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/15. Journalist Matt Taibbi talks about his book "The Divide: American Injustice in the Age of the Wealth Gap."

title: Denis Leary
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/16. Actor and comedian Denis Leary stops by the show to talk to Jon about his new movie "Draft Day."

title: Colin Firth
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/17. Jon chats with actor Colin Firth about his new movie "The Railway Man."

title: Jennifer Garner
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/18. Jon welcomes actress Jennifer Garner to the show to talk about her role in the movie "Draft Day."

title: Gina McCarthy
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/29. Jon talks to Gina McCarthy, administrator for the United States Environmental Protection Agency.

title: Elizabeth Warren
description: Watch with Prime starting 4/30. Democratic senator from Massachusetts Elizabeth Warren discusses her book "A Fighting Chance."

title: Robin Roberts
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/1. Robin Roberts, anchor of ABC's "Good Morning America," talks with Jon about her book "Everybody's Got Something."

title: Ramachandra Guha
description: Jon welcomes historian Ramachandra Guha to the show to discuss his latest book "Gandhi Before India."

title: Mookie Wilson
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/6. Former baseball player Mookie Wilson stops by to talk about his book "Mookie: Life, Baseball, and the '86 Mets."

title: William Cohan
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/7. Jon talks with William Cohan, author of the book "The Price of Silence: The Duke Lacrosse Scandal, the Power of the Elite, and the Corruption of Our Great Universities."

title: Martin Gilens & Benjamin Page
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/8. Political scientists Martin Gilens and Benjamin Page discuss their study "Testing Theories of American Politics: Elites, Interest Groups, and Average Citizens."

title: David Spade
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/9. Jon chats with David Spade about his new Comedy Central special "David Spade: My Fake Problems."

title: Mariano Rivera
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/13. Former New York Yankee Mariano Rivera sits down with Jon to discuss his book "The Closer."

title: Peter Schuck
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/14. Jon welcomes Peter Schuck to the show, author of the book "Why Government Fails So Often: And How It Can Do Better."

title: Seth Rogen
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/15. Actor Seth Rogen stops by the show to talk about his role in the new movie "Neighbors."

title: Katie Couric
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/16. Broadcast journalist Katie Couric discusses her documentary "Fed Up," which talks about the ways in which foods that contain sugar are affecting health in America.

title: Martin Blaser
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/20. Dr. Martin Blaser sits down with Jon to discuss his book "Missing Microbes: How the Overuse of Antibiotics Is Fueling Our Modern Plagues."

title: Ron Suskind
description: Author Ron Suskind talks about his latest book "Life, Animated: A Story of Sidekicks, Heroes, and Autism."

title: Blondie
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/22. Jon chats with the band Blondie about the release of their album "Blondie 4(0)-Ever."

title: Jim Parsons
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/23. Actor Jim Parsons stops by the show to talk about his role in HBO's television adaptation of "The Normal Heart."

title: James McAvoy
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/27. Actor James McAvoy discusses his role in the new movie "X-Men: Days of Future Past."

title: Aneesh Chopra
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/28. Jon welcomes to the show Aneesh Chopra, author of the book "Innovative State: How New Technologies Can Transform Government."

title: Timothy Geithner
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/29. Jon speaks with Timothy Geithner, former Secretary of the U.S. Department of the Treasury, about his book "Stress Test: Reflections on Financial Crises."

title: Drew Barrymore
description: Watch with Prime starting 5/30. Actress Drew Barrymore talks about her role in the movie "Blended."

title: Robert De Niro
description: Watch with Prime starting 6/10. Actor Robert De Niro sits down with Jon to discuss his documentary "Remembering the Artist: Robert De Niro, Sr."

title: Ricky Gervais
description: Jon talks to actor and comedian Ricky Gervais about the second season of his series "Derek."

title: Gigi Ibrahim
description: Watch with Prime starting 6/12. Jon welcomes to the show Gigi Ibrahim, an Egyptian journalist, blogger, and social activist.

title: Tom Cruise
description: Tom Cruise stops by the show to talk about his new movie "Edge of Tomorrow."
